:

to

dependencies

Why
/
User
Benefit
/
User
Problem
-
Description
of
Feature
(
Added
by
PM
)
-
Add
any
additional
links
or
research
related
to
this
feature
.
-
Immediate
task
:
Convert
to
epic
and
move
to
appropriate
milestone
#
#
#

Criteria
(

.

to

is

)

completed
-

stories
completed
-

written
and

-

completed
-

done

/
